scenario.name: Basic UAC scenario
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID:[call_id] Cseq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: SIPP Testing Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length:[len]
v=0 o=alice 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 3 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:3 GSM/8000

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: SIPP Testing Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 2 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: SIPP Testing Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: 0
v=0 o=alice 53655765 2353687638 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 3 a=rtpmap:3 GSM/8000

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 2 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: SIPP Testing Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 3 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: SIPP Testing Content-Length: 0
